name: Racin' Force
overview:
Racin' Force (レーシングフォース Rēshingu Fōsu?) is a 3D racing game developed and published by Konami and released in 1994 on arcade platforms.

The game is a racing game all in 3D featuring low level polygons similar to Virtual racing. The player can select up to four tracks to race; Circuit Course, High-Speed Circuit, Enduro Circuit and Country Road, each track based on a difficulty level. The players race against eight opponents and the game can be played up to eight players simultaneously.

The game features a system of checkpoints where the player have to reach under a certain amount of time, and remaining time will be extended for the next checkpoint. The game also features a day/night system which add more realism to the races.
